messages.message:
Ok the crucial detail missing was that you have FR turned on.
I’m now able to reproduce it on both prod and master.

I did some troubleshooting, it looks like the text content is correct and it is indexed in weaviate. My guess is that what’s wrong is the mapping between the chunks and the page numbers.
 @Rahul Rawal you were doing some refactoring of markdown metadata. Any ideas why line_to_page mapping might not be populated correctly with FR?
I didn’t turn that on by purpose. Is that a default setting now.
Why does it only fail on some documents
It is not default, when I create a new project it’s off, that’s why I had a hard time reproducing it at first. No idea why was it on for you
Still strange the other documents in the same project work fine

Right, this is interesting, I had tried with another FR doc and it worked fine. Maybe there is something specific in the Form Recognizer output for this one, that would explain why we didn’t catch it earlier.

I’ll let @Rahul Rawal take a look what’s going on there
@Sławek Biel is the line_to_page list wrongly populated?
Yes, it looks like it has zeros only, as all I can search is Page 1
